scripts.build: yarn build_client && yarn build_server && mkdir -p "backend/dist/public" && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/dist/public && echo "{ "scripts":{ "start":"node src/main" } }" >> backend/dist/package.json
scripts.postbuild: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && yarn start:dev" "cd frontend && yarn dev --host"
